programme.desc: Haji Rhoma Irama hopes his daughter will get married soon. While the daughter, Syafa, still wants to spend her time with a career, Mia, her mother, also supports her. With great patience, Pak Haji Rhoma Irama advised his daughter to be able to run both at the same time. Until Mia and Syafa were melted by Pak Haji's advice to run both together. Pak Haji Rhoma Irama tries to find the right match for Syafa. Of all the men who came, Pak Haji could not yet decide who would be the Imam for his son.

programme.title: Hidup Kadang Di Atas Kadang Di Pelaminan
programme.desc: Seorang gadis cantik manis yang kalau keringetan bau badannya seperti bau jengkol, gadis cantik tersebut bernama Cinta (Shanice Margaretha). Cinta ini seringkali dibully karena baunya yang kalau keringetan seperti bau jengkol dan bahkan beberapa cewek merasa, bahwa Cinta ini tidak layak untuk mendapatkan cowok tampan. Namun ternyata Cinta malah menyukai cowok lain yang ternyata adalah anak dari musuh bebuyutan sang emak, Dika (Hardi Fadhillah).

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 235
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Ketika Level Tertinggi Cinta Adalah Soto Ayam
programme.desc: The story of a haphazard guy named Raga who struggles to graduate from college because he has become an eternal student. Raga must meet a soto seller girl named Alin who also studies at the same campus as him. Their unfamiliarity always steals the attention and to the point where the two actually fall in love with each other.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 221
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 206
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Anak Jalanan Pembawa Berkah (SPC Ramadhan)_x000D__x000D_
programme.desc: Safa (Naqueenza) was kidnapped due to the negligence of Lisa (Citra Anggun) who was busy with her friends. Fortunately, Safa managed to escape and met Lani (Syaquila). Although Lani is a street child, she is very kind and diligent in her worship. Lani also likes to share her sustenance with fellow street children. During this time Safa was not taught about religion by Lisa and also Yudi (Hessel Steven). Safa finally learned it all from Lani. Safa accidentally met Lisa while chasing pickpockets.

programme.title: Salfok Sama Neng Domba Satu Ini_x000D__x000D_
programme.desc: Virza's restaurant had to go bankrupt because his lamb supplier was late in delivering meat for his restaurant. Sifa, the owner of the sheep farm, had to compensate by selling Virza's small shop. The two of them are getting closer, Virza secretly also has feelings for Sifa.

programme.title: Sujud Terakhir Ibuku (SPC Ramadhan)
programme.desc: Living a busy life makes Desi (Linda Ramadhanty) always grateful and not forget the 5 daily prayers. But not with Syarif, her husband and also Angga (Raeshard Octaviansha) and Karin (Michella Adlen) who forget to pray. Desi is never discouraged to continue praying that her husband and children will be guided. While depositing money into the bank, Syarif is pickpocketed and dies. Angga, who never knew about prayer, was reluctant to pray for his father and take care of his funeral.

programme.desc: Abi (Kevin Kambey) is kicked out of the house for being unruly. Talita (Elma Agustin), who knew Abi was kicked out and had nothing, left him immediately. Abi, who didn't know where to go, was suddenly hit by a motorcycle and helped by Rindu (Georgina). Rindu also invites him home and is given a place to stay in the room next to the mosque by Komar (Tasman Taher), Rindu's father. Abi feels ashamed because he hasn't prayed in a long time. Komar teaches him again and advises Abi about prayer.

programme.title: Deux Femmes
programme.desc: 1965. Colette, a woman of so-called loose morals, is wrongly accused of murder by misogynist policemen. Anne-Marie, a young examining magistrate, is given the case. programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Ages - EP 1

programme.title: Super Plex - EP 1
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam Et Julia - EP 6
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 21
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 6

They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.desc: Humour with spikes on! Phony reports, high-jacked programmes, pretend live broadcasts, mock celebrity interviews, fake adverts, street interviews... With their team of presenters, Adrien Devyver and Jerome de Warzee bring their own unique twist to news from Belgium and around the world, so prepare for a result that's distinctly... lively!

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 10
programme.desc: In 1991 Estonia became the only country to obtain its independence from the USSR by peaceful means. After seven centuries of foreign occupation, it could finally become itself. Today this innovative and creative country is also one of the world's most digitalised, yet still still retains its traditions and customs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: 20h30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 13
programme.desc: Iannicko N'Doua and Maxime Le Flaguais discover Viella, in the French region of Occitanie. A trip rich in wine, family and impressive chateaux.

programme.title: Secrets D'histoire - EP 8
programme.desc: 1559. During a tournament, Henri II, king of France, receives an eye injury. He dies ten days later leaving Catherine de' Medici a widow. A look back at the life of one of the emblematic figures of the Renaissance, in the troubled period when Protestantism rose to prominence in Europe.

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planete B - EP 6
programme.desc: To what extent does advertising encourage us to buy useless things? Can we calculate its impact on the climate? Could we regulate it (or even ban it) to meet climate targets? Discussion with the economist Mathilde Dupre.

programme.title: Sans Frapper
programme.desc: A kaleidoscopic look at the issue of rape, presenting the true story by a victim, Ada, through several voices.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Mere De Ma Mere
programme.desc: Confronted with the emotional difficulties of a mother in distress, 12 year-old Djenaba, takes on a parental role to protect her.

programme.title: Henri Des, Une Histoire De Famille
programme.desc: Sixty years of music, thousands of concerts, four and a half million albums sold, fifteen gold discs, thirty schools bearing his name... Henri Des is a monument. In Switzerland, France, Belgium and Quebec, four generations of children know his songs. An intimate look at the creator.

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Geopolitis is a programme which presents what are often complex international situations in a clear, precise and concise manner.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Appeles De La Guerre D'algerie, Un Si Long Silence
programme.desc: Between 1954 and 1962, over a million and a half French conscripts sacrificed their youth in the Algerian War. From this founding experience little remains. How could an entire generation simply disappear from the pages of history? Why this wall of silence? Those who were witnesses recount their stories.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Le Code - EP 5
programme.desc: It's Jeanne Vanhoven's comeback to the assize court, to defend David Kerval, a novelist suffering from an obsessive-compulsive disorder, accused of murdering his wife. Claire assists Jacqueline Arsena, mother of a young woman killed by a drug addict who's requesting early release. Idriss learns that his health is deteriorating...

programme.title: Le Code - EP 6
programme.desc: Whilst Idriss and Nadia head to Paris for the trial of Carl Roussel, the man who shot Idriss, Claire finds herself in the eye of the storm: Jacqueline Arsena has committed a murder and had warned her that she was intending to do so.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Crabe Bleu, Chronique D'une Invasion
programme.desc: A veritable plague for fishermen and oyster farmers alike! ''Callinectes sapidus'', commonly known as the blue crab due to the colour of its spiny shell, is equipped with claws able to crush anything it meets. Perfectly at home in Mediterranean waters, the crustacean is proliferating at an exponential rate.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 4
programme.desc: Pauline Horellou, in Pays Bigouden, and Gaelle de Trescadec, in Cap Sizun, bring time to a standstill as they paint the portrait of the most dramatic waves. They are part of a new community of storm chasers, sharing their photos and enjoying a notable success on social media.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1561
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: C'est Plus Qu'un Jardin - EP 12
programme.desc: Veronique, Bryan and the children pick Brussels sprouts before closing down the vegetable garden with Dany. It's market day at the Sacres-Coeurs Academy. The team welcome the Claveau-Audet family for a veritable harvest festival.

programme.title: Vers Les Sommets - EP 4
programme.desc: Three professional mountaineers, the Swiss Stephan Siegrist and Germans Thomas and Alexander Huber, attempt a new line up the North Face of the Eiger. They have given themselves three years to prepare and plan this route into the unknown, a major challenge dedicated to absent friends, mountaineers who have died.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 8
programme.desc: Preserving the trace, refusing to allow memories to disappear... Valerie Jolly moulds objects that bear witness to times past, stone, pipes, things abandoned... from figurative to abstract, expanding the field of possibility...

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 10
programme.desc: Michelin-star chef eric Canino welcomes us to his restaurant La Voile in Ramatuelle and his hotel La Reserve, near Saint-Tropez. A great opportunity to rediscover the unique charms of coastal Provence and share his passion for local produce.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: C'est Plus Qu'un Jardin - EP 12
programme.desc: Veronique, Bryan and the children pick Brussels sprouts before closing down the vegetable garden with Dany. It's market day at the Sacres-Coeurs Academy. The team welcome the Claveau-Audet family for a veritable harvest festival.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 4
programme.desc: Pauline Horellou, in Pays Bigouden, and Gaelle de Trescadec, in Cap Sizun, bring time to a standstill as they paint the portrait of the most dramatic waves. They are part of a new community of storm chasers, sharing their photos and enjoying a notable success on social media.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 20
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette - EP 34
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Comptines De Maryse - EP 8
programme.desc: Octave shows Maryse the drawing he's made for the cover of a book about space. Maryse is very impressed, and begins a nursery rhyme about travelling in a space rocket.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 17
programme.desc: Charlie and Elliot enjoy a photography lesson with Julie Artacho, who shares her top tips on immortalising your favourite festive moments with family or friends.

programme.title: Les 30 Travaux De Charlie Et Elliot - EP 18
programme.desc: The festive season can also be synonymous with social anxiety. Charlie and Elliot welcome the humorist Coco Belliveau who has a few useful hints to help control your stress levels during the period.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux - EP 27
programme.desc: Alix believes that the sword stuck in the stinky cheese is a magical one. As a result, Hare has become king of the Wonderfolk. But his reign looks to be short-lived as Chief prepares to rebel.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 10
programme.desc: Michelin-star chef eric Canino welcomes us to his restaurant La Voile in Ramatuelle and his hotel La Reserve, near Saint-Tropez. A great opportunity to rediscover the unique charms of coastal Provence and share his passion for local produce.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 1562

Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 22
programme.desc: Valentin was eleven years old. One July evening in 2008, he was murdered whilst cycling in a small municipality in the Ain. A violent, gratuitous and totally incomprehensible crime. Unravelling a particularly complicated investigation, the police eventually came to concentrate their efforts on a somewhat strange and mystical couple.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Les Docs De La Grande Librairie - Maupassant
programme.desc: The author of ''Good Friend'', ''A Life'' and ''The Horla'' was a veritable comet. In twelve years Guy de Maupassant wrote six novels, seven plays, some three hundred novellas and thousands of articles... before dying in 1893, aged 42. A look back at the life and career of an anticonformist.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Niagara
programme.desc: Having just lost his job, Alain learns of his father's unexpected death. He and his youngest brother Leo-Louis head off to Niagara Falls, to meet up with their older brother Victor-Hugo and scatter his father's ashes. An opportunity for plenty of comedy but also for the brothers to reconnect...

programme.title: Movie - Uthamaputhiran

programme.desc: Aadhi, a smart and suave smuggler in Bangkok, falls in love with a waitress. However, he finds himself in trouble when she frames him for all the crimes committed by his look-alike, Bhagavan.

programme.title: Movie - Jey Ram
programme.desc: Jai is a real patriot. He loses a boxing match to a Pakistani player, who thereafter humiliates India and Indians. Jai fights again and wins.

programme.desc: Friendship turns into love for Karthik and Anitha as they grow up playing pranks on each other. Karthik's dad, the only one who knows about them, passes away suddenly, leaving them to their fate.

programme.desc: After his ex-girlfriend Shweta approaches Sathya to help her find her missing daughter, he decides to investigate. Confusion arises when Shweta's husband refuses to accept that they have a daughter.

programme.title: Movie - Thiruvilayadal Arambam
programme.desc: Guru hatches several plans to separate Priya and her lover Thirukumaran. However, each time Thirukumaran successfully manages to escape from Guru's evil plans and traps him in another problem.

programme.title: Movie - Kidari
programme.desc: Kombaiah Pandiayan, a big shot in his village, is stabbed by one of his enemies. Following this, his loyal servant Kidaari sets out to find the culprit.

programme.title: Movie - Paapanasam
programme.desc: Suyambulingam, a school drop-out but an intelligent man, acquires knowledge by watching movies. When a dark incident seems to ruin his family, he uses all his wits to protect them.

programme.title: Movie - Bramman
programme.desc: Siva, a movie buff, owns a cinema theatre, which runs into financial trouble. However, his life changes for the better when he meets his childhood friend who is now a famous movie director.

programme.title: Movie - Kadavulukku Ore Kaditham
programme.desc: Thyagu, an honest lawyer, postpones his marriage so that he can help his brother have a good future. However, things take a turn when his brother becomes a doctor.

programme.desc: A radio jockey has a fan in the form of a girl who often sends song requests. Both fall in love after talking over the phone. When it is time to meet face to face, the boy develops an inferiority complex.

programme.title: Movie - Vaanmathi

programme.title: Movie - Suyetchai M.L.A

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: A product of Barcelona's famed La Masia youth academy, Cesc Fabregas is rightly remembered as one of the greatest midfield players of his generation. After making his Arsenal debut at just 16 years of age the diminutive Spaniard would go on to win titles in both England and Spain as well as becoming a World Cup winner in 2010. Now taking his first steps into coaching with Como 1907, Fabregas reflects on his footballing education as well as his hopes for the future in management.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 16 MAR
programme.desc: Highlights of every Matchweek 29 fixture, includes the opening clash of the weekend with Everton hosting West Ham, rivals Arsenal and Chelsea face off in a London derby, and Leicester take on Manchester United at the King Power Stadium.

programme.title: Ipswich Town vs Nottingham Forest (MW29) (Live) - EP 283
programme.desc: The 33rd season of the Premier League sees Manchester City defend its title against a host of teams keen for glory themselves. 20 teams are in the mix but only 1 champion will emerge ultimately.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Arsenal (MW28) - EP 279
programme.desc: Manchester United have won 99 of their meetings with Arsenal in all competitions (D54 L90) - it’s the Gunners’ most defeats against an opponent, while the Red Devils have only beaten Aston Villa more (106).

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 13
programme.desc: In this episode of 1-to-11, the legend that is Claude Makelele selects his ultimate Premier League One to Eleven, featuring the very best players he played with and against. programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 31
programme.desc: After a nomadic start to his career, it now seems that Pervis Estupinan has found his footballing home at Brighton & Hove Albion. programme.title: FS MMA Anthony Ruiz vs. Bobby Southworth
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Bobby Southworth faces Anthony "A-Train" Ruiz in this light heavyweight championship bout that goes the distance in a 5 round war from San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Emmanuel Rodriguez vs. Melvin Lopez
programme.desc: From the MGM National Harbor in Oxon Hill, Maryland, a main event showdown between two of the world's top bantamweights, Emmanuel Rodriguez and Melvin Lopez, will decide the IBF Bantamweight World Champion. Rodriguez (21-2) is a former world champion, enters the bout off a victory over undefeated Gary Antonio Russell, and now sits at #2 in the world rankings according to the IBF.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we focus on the martial art of breaking and how the techniques are fine-tuned with technology.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jonathon Banks vs. Seth Mitchell
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a heavyweight battle that ends in a curious decision between Jonathon Banks and Seth Mitchell , as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Goeido, Okinoumi and Takakeisho from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 5 featuring Mitakeumi, Goeido, Okinoumi and Takakeisho from the Aki basho, 2019.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: FS MMA Anthony Ruiz vs. Bobby Southworth
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Bobby Southworth faces Anthony "A-Train" Ruiz in this light heavyweight championship bout that goes the distance in a 5 round war from San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jermain Taylor vs. Jeff Lacy

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Miguel Rodriguez

programme.desc: JoJo wonders why the moon is a funny shape. Gran Gran explains why the moon appears to change shape in the night sky, and together they make a moon diary for JoJo to take home.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 36
programme.desc: A trip to the art gallery unexpectedly helps Duck with the hunt for his lost toy Rhino.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 37
programme.desc: Sarah is inspired by listening to a poetry record and decides to make up some poetry of her own.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 6
programme.desc: There's a fancy dress competition on the railways and while Thomas and the others are excited, Shankar doesn't want to join in.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: Bluey promises her customer, Bingo, the best tour ever in a game of Whale Watching, but they need Mum and Dad to join in, and they are too tired to play after a late night.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: When Dad's accused of fluffing in Bluey's face as he climbed out of bed, he's put on trial with Mum as the judge, and Bluey and Bingo as witnesses. Bluey might also have to explain what she was doing there.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo love to video chat with Muffin and Socks so they can all draw pictures together. When Muffin won't give Socks a turn, the kids discover what happens when you hog.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 51
programme.desc: Evil Pea plans to freeze Supertato into an ice cube by pretending to teach him to dance.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 43
programme.desc: In this aerial adventure the Go Jetters are on the Strait of Gibraltar, Southern Spain to follow a group of migrating baby stalks as they make their journey from Spain to Africa.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 44
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are on Whistler Mountain in Canada doing some skiing and checking out the amazing cable car which runs high up between the mountains.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 45
programme.desc: After watching a solar eclipse, the team head into space to fix the biggest glitch yet!

programme.title: My World Kitchen (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: Kay has invited his friends to taste his Polish Dill Pickle Soup, which is full of vegetables. Kay serves the delicious soup in baked bread rolls with cream on top.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Andy embarks on an adventure to Bolivia in South America in search of a caiman eggshell.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 23
programme.desc: In this episode Seaweed is missing his family, so Sandy organises a 'Boom' video call with his (and Captain Captain's) unusual relatives.

programme.title: Panda and Krash (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: The toys are playing and passing a red ball around and catching it. But Raccoon won't play

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 48
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo and Mum get into a debate with Dad about the definition of teasing. As they recall all the times where he's been a Big Teaser, Dad argues that he was only just playing.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 49

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 12

programme.desc: The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.title: Waktunya Srimulat Bercyanda

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Talk Africa

programme.title: Under The Microscope - EP 8
programme.desc: The period drama revolves around mathematician Shuai Jia Mo who stumbles upon an old accounting issue in the local municipal level. While attempting to correct the mistake, he triggers tension with upper government officials.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 29
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride - EP 30

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Truth - EP 1
programme.desc: Lin Yuanhao and Lin Lan represent the technical staff of the prosecution, using advanced professional technology to help prosecutors solve difficult cases and overcome "zero confession" cases.

programme.title: Love Song in Winter - EP 17
programme.desc: Detective Jiang Chengyi (Huang Jingyu) and anesthesiologist Lu Yan (Sun Qian) unexpectedly reunite eight years after their breakup. Together, they solve a serial murder case, clear up misunderstandings, and rekindle their relationship.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: The Midnight Studio - EP 5
programme.desc: The series tells a thrilling story of mean photographer Seo Ki Joo (Joo Won) who runs a photo studio that exists only for the deceased, passionate lawyer Han Boo (Kwon Nara) and the eerie night visitors, who travel between life and death.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 2
programme.desc: The story tells of Ji Ying Ying (Tan Song Yun) from the Huahua Dyehouse during the Tang Dynasty. She bravely faces foreign invaders and guards her dyeing techniques. Later, she creatively spreads these methods overseas, becoming the Dyeing Ambassador of Tang.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1907
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 579
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Darkside of the Moon - EP 9
programme.desc: She Manyue (Tavia Yeung) appears to be a glamorous and skilled crisis management expert, but she has a tragic past. Eighteen years ago, she and her sister were assaulted by wealthy heir Jiang Jijun (Edward Ma), leading to a devastating upheaval in her family.

programme.title: Kill Me Love Me - EP 17
programme.desc: The story follows Prince Murong Jinghe of the Dayan Kingdom (Liu Xueyi) and a young girl Mei Lin (Wu Jinyan), from Qingzhou, as they support each other through the tides of fate. They bravely defy destiny, risking their lives to break free and persevere.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1907
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 20
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love's Rebellion - EP 21
programme.desc: Nan Yan (Jing Tian) joins the Yangyue Sect to study poison techniques in order to treat her mother's heart condition. She inadvertently forms a 'marriage bond' with Emperor Ji Yang (Krien Zhang) and gets entangled in a huge conspiracy.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 30
programme.desc: The story revolves around six lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Love Endures - EP 31
programme.desc: The story revolves around six lifelong companions who reside in the same area, relying on and supporting each other through their toughest times. They undergo separation and reunite years later.

programme.title: Brocade Odyssey - EP 2

programme.title: Forensic JD - EP 10
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 580

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1908
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 19
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Song Of Youth (TVB) - EP 20
programme.desc: Lin Shao Chun, the daughter of a formerly-powerful family during Ming Dynasty was left no choice but to join a performing troupe to stay afloat where she meets a rich heir, Sun Yu Lou. Will she pick love or seek justice for her family?

programme.title: Angel In-the-Making - EP 21
programme.desc: During their nursing internship at the hospital, final year nursing students, KI LOK (Eliza Sam) together with her classmates TANG LAI-CHING (Moon Lau) and YU YUET-OI (Jinny Ng), are assigned to a ward known as "Hell's ward" to receive training under the supervision of a registered nurse called YEUNG CHI-MING (Tony Hung).

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 2
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Triumph in the Skies II - EP 39
programme.desc: SAMUEL TONG (Francis Ng) stays in the UK to spend a long vacation following his wife's death. After encountering HOLIDAY HO (Fala Chen), a wanderer who just got dumped, he ends his vacation early and returns to Hong Kong, joining Skylette Airlines as a pilot to fly again. He meets Captain JAYDEN KOO (Julian Cheung), and the two exhibit two distinct personalities, with SAMUEL being reserved and JAYDEN being a man who likes to attract attention.

programme.title: Triumph in the Skies II - EP 40
programme.desc: SAMUEL TONG (Francis Ng) stays in the UK to spend a long vacation following his wife's death. After encountering HOLIDAY HO (Fala Chen), a wanderer who just got dumped, he ends his vacation early and returns to Hong Kong, joining Skylette Airlines as a pilot to fly again. He meets Captain JAYDEN KOO (Julian Cheung), and the two exhibit two distinct personalities, with SAMUEL being reserved and JAYDEN being a man who likes to attract attention.

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 29
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit people’s superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Triumph in the Skies II - EP 42
programme.desc: SAMUEL TONG (Francis Ng) stays in the UK to spend a long vacation following his wife's death. After encountering HOLIDAY HO (Fala Chen), a wanderer who just got dumped, he ends his vacation early and returns to Hong Kong, joining Skylette Airlines as a pilot to fly again. He meets Captain JAYDEN KOO (Julian Cheung), and the two exhibit two distinct personalities, with SAMUEL being reserved and JAYDEN being a man who likes to attract attention.

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 31
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit people’s superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Daddy Cool - EP 32
programme.desc: CHUNG DING-KWOK (Carlos Chan), a guerrilla who was cryogenically frozen more than 70 years ago during the Second Sino-Japanese War, is accidentally thawed amid a storm, only to find himself in the year of 2018. Looking for his family, DING-KWOK is shocked to see how his descendants have gone astray. His son HO WO-PING (David Chiang) defrauds the social welfare system; whereas his grandson HO WING-LIN (Wayne Lai) poses as a Feng Shui master to exploit people’s superstitions for profit.

programme.title: Links To Temptation - EP 16
programme.desc: The subtle relationship between Barrister SHING WAI-SHUN (Steven Ma) and pole dancer HUNG LONG-KIU (Fala Chen) begins with a cell phone. KIU has been treating SHUN hot and cold. On top of his he also finds her somewhat unpredictable so he decides to check her out secretly. His good friend KWAN HO-CHING (Yoyo Mung) discovers that KIU is going out with rich businessman KO WING-TAI (Lau Tan). Under SHUN’s questioning, KIU confesses she is coveting TAI’s money, telling him to give up his hope.

programme.title: Go! Go! Go! Operation C9 - EP 10
programme.desc: The organization to which agent C9 Yue Siu-Kiu (Samantha Ko) belongs is eradicated. Lonesome Siu-kiu encounters vegetable vendor Ko Tai-king (Kenneth Ma). After getting married, she takes care of her father-in-law Ko Au (Lee Ka Ting), big sister-in-law Ko Ching-lai (Yuen Kit Yee), younger brother-in-law Ko Tai-kiu (Brian Chu) and stepson Ko Hei-long, who collectively make up a dysfunctional family. She has become a proper housewife after five years.

programme.title: Freedom Memories - EP 11
programme.desc: Longtime friends Lau Tak-wing (Dickson Yu) and Chai Hing-chau (Karl Ting) are so eager to be admitted into the Artist Training Program that they push each other to their physical limits. In their dogged pursuit for stardom, the pair is joined by Keung Chi-ngan (Tiffany Lau), who was the first runner-up for Miss Hong Kong, and actress/showbiz baby Wan Chor-yue (Joey Thye), among others, on their journey towards living their dreams.

programme.title: LEGEND OF THE CONDOR HEROES - EP 12
programme.desc: Ching wins, but the raving Chau greatly annoys to invade Wong. At the end ,all of them are driven out of the Island. Afterwards, Ching and Yung have to overcome many obstacles before they can be reunited again._x000D_On the other hand, Hong and the Kam Emperor, in order to invade the Sung Dynasty , Plot to steal Wu’s book ’ The Art of War’ from Sung. Their conspiracy is know by Ching and Yung , and they vow to protect their own country.

programme.title: Crimson Sabre - EP 35
programme.desc: The Government in late Qing Dynasty was so corrupt that good and loyal officials and their families were being exterminated. Among these victims were Woon and his son Chi (Lam Ka Tung). Fortunately, Chi was saved by the "Golden Snake" Yi (Kong Wa) and was sent to learn martial arts in Wah Shan. Yi, on the other hand, went to take revenge on the Wan’s, the renowned house of bandits, and took hostage of their daughter Yee (Melissa Ng).

programme.title: Blade Heart - EP 1
programme.desc: The Szema family murdered the Tong family in order to monopolize the weapons industry. Twenty years later, the chief of Brocade Guards, YUEMAN FUNG (CHENG SIU CHOW, ADAM), fights against MRS. WONG (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) of the biggest escort carrier in town. During the fight, they realize they might know each other…_x000D__x000D_ FUNG has changed his name, put on an eye patch and become a Brocade Guard. His wife, TONG PIK, has married WONG.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled "2046" which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of "Infernal Affairs" are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Girl with the Diamond Slipper
programme.desc: An aspiring TV actress gets into hot water when a stolen diamond is hidden in the shoes she bought for a party.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Man's father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: Chinese Odyssey 2002
programme.desc: Set in Ming Dynasty, young Emperor Zheng De escapes from the palace with his sister who disguised as a man. They run into a notorious wanderer who runs a restaurant with his boyish sister in Jiang Nan. The two pairs of siblings from vastly different social classes descend into an inescapable swirl of gender confusion, slapstick antics and love.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, "The Eagle Shooting Heroes" is loosely based on Louis Cha's classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung's action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Golden Chicken
programme.desc: Ah Kam, a seasoned prostitute, gets locked inside an ATM vestibule with a thief. Both discover they are ill-fated in life and Ah Kam starts telling him her life story as a prostitute, from a teenage hooker to a PR girl in an upscale club in her thirties, as well as being a strip dancer, bar girl and masseuse.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well Too
programme.desc: Another super comedy directed by Clifton Ko about more farcical couplings, mistaken identities, infidelities, and arranged marriages set in the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: Hai Sheng has been an undercover agent for eight years. After arresting the head of a criminal gang, he finally sheds his undercover life and resumes the life of a police officer. However, he finds his current life even tougher as he is not trusted by his colleagues, dumped by his girlfriend and pursued by criminals.

programme.title: Long Arm of the Law Part 3
programme.desc: Chinese ex-soldier Li is wrongly accused and seeks refuge in Hong Kong to escape a death sentence. En route, he meets Sam and Moon. While Li has fallen in love with Moon, Hong Kong triad kidnaps Moon and coerces Li into aiding a robbery. Meanwhile, the mainland police officer tracks Li's path to Hong Kong, intensifying the chase.

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: My Wife is 18
programme.desc: Cheung, a dull thirty-year-old man, gets married in the UK to lovely YoYo, who is just eighteen, so as to fulfil their parents' wishes. Back in Hong Kong, their relationship is that of an assumed couple, as well as a teacher and student. With contradictions and funny incidents governing their relationship, the two gradually fall in love...

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Secret Service of the Imperial Court
programme.desc: Zhao Bu Fan is the sergeant of the government's secret police. Wang is a cruel and ruthless eunuch who takes over the Emperor's ruling power and leads the team of secret agents. After witnessing the atrocities committed by Eunuch Wang, Sergeant Zhao decides to defect but ends up being hunted by his friends, comrades and even his father.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of 'scaffolding kung fu".

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: In this action comedy, two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and accidentally become patriotic heroes. Assisted by a warlord's daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demon's clutches.

programme.title: The Golden Lion
programme.desc: The Golden Lion is a bandit with good martial arts skills and often robs from the rich to help the poor. He is ambushed and attacked by a gang one night but luckily found help from a master healer, who has to find a way to treat him while they are both being chased by the gang.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy "House of 72 tenants", this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: The Kung-fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wong's caught in the Mong's territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Ping's limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Heroes of the East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sister's wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her...

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him...

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fiance to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Global Golden Line
programme.desc: It is the first professional reality car show, providing concrete evaluations of cars on the market, the deepest appreciation for classic cars, the hottest trends in the motoring world, and analysis of the latest auto tech trends.

programme.title: 2025 New Taipei City Wan Jin Shi Marathon
programme.desc: The 2025 New Taipei City Wan Jin Shi Marathon will take place on March 16, bringing together elite runners from around the world to compete on one of Taiwan's most scenic racecourses. Starting from Wanli Feicui Bay and winding along the breathtaking North Coast, participants will not only enjoy stunning ocean views but also push their limits and experience the thrill of the "most beautiful racecourse.

programme.title: TVBS News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest Taiwan and international news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go
programme.desc: Hosted by Sam Tseng and Hsu Nai Lin, this top Taiwan variety show, splits celebrity guests into two teams to battle in various game segments.

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Go! Two- Day Trip
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audience's view point, program's hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Atom Boyz Ⅱ
programme.desc: Atom Boyz II, Taiwan's most anticipated male reality talent show, features Ou Han-sheng, Hsieh Kun-Da, and Nine One One's Liao Jian-Jhih as celebrity mentors, with MuMu (Lin Wei-Ni) as the host. The 54 contestants are divided into six distinctively styled groups to compete fiercely against one another. How will they redefine the future of Taiwanese boy bands and become the next supergroup to take the Mandarin music scene by storm?

programme.title: Atom Boyz Ⅱ
programme.desc: Atom Boyz II, Taiwan's most anticipated male reality talent show, features Ou Han-sheng, Hsieh Kun-Da, and Nine One One's Liao Jian-Jhih as celebrity mentors, with MuMu (Lin Wei-Ni) as the host. The 54 contestants are divided into six distinctively styled groups to compete fiercely against one another. How will they redefine the future of Taiwanese boy bands and become the next supergroup to take the Mandarin music scene by storm?

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's World News
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: TVBS Sisy's Finance Weekly
programme.desc: Stay with Host Sisy Chen and the experts for the latest in global news, financial updates and current political events.

programme.title: Super Taste: Hungry Generations
